---
title: "About me"
---

Hello! I am Hisatake (Take) Ishida, PhD candidate at the University of Queensland. Supervised by Associate Professor Cheong Xin Chan and Professor Cynthia Riginos.

The overarching aim of my PhD is:

**To**

**Will coral evolution be able to keep pace with climate change?**\
The results suggest that outcomes are likely to vary across the GBR, with an increasingly pessimistic outlook for all coral communities if we fail to reduce our carbon emissions in the near future. The models I am building currently using explicit genetics and size-dependent dynamics share this result!
